channel.title: Website help
channel.description: Hey guys, This is going to sound like a noob question, Which i'm sorry about. I'm pretty new too HTML, So I don't know very much about it. So here's the problem: I have a website for my RSPS, And a place that you can register on the forums. I added in a text box when you register, saying "In Game Name". That works and everything, but I want to be able to show it on the users profile. Because currently, if you enter your IGN in their, it does nothing. I would like to be able to see it in the users profile. --- Here is the coding for the text box I added: [code] In Game Name: [/code] So how would I make it add their IGN that they typed into that box come up onto their profile?

item.title: Website help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You could always integrate accounts with the site and servers so it always matches

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“TTSxClan, post:6, topic:463617”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=567175.msg4121696#msg4121696 date=1349815070]

You’re not using any forum software?
[/quote]Im using a custom one that I found on here, it’s an old Runescape one.

The same one me and Justin are creating? Lol. RCS by any chance?

Actually, Yes it is. Lol. It looks great btw.[/quote]

If you’d like to wait until version 1.5 or 1.6 we should have forums/user profiles.

Read full topic

item.title: Website help
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

The easiest way to do this would be using some php. Write a file that connects to a database and stores the information posted by the form. Then connect to the same database and retrieve that information.

Here’s some useful tutorials I’ve written on this subject:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


The following script is to do with dynamic form content:
moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Website help
item.dc:creator: @TTSxClan TTSxClan
item.description:
@TTSxClan wrote:

Hey guys, This is going to sound like a noob question, Which i’m sorry about. I’m pretty new too HTML, So I don’t know very much about it. So here’s the problem:

I have a website for my RSPS, And a place that you can register on the forums. I added in a text box when you register, saying “In Game Name”. That works and everything, but I want to be able to show it on the users profile. Because currently, if you enter your IGN in their, it does nothing. I would like to be able to see it in the users profile.

Here is the coding for the text box I added:

</tr> <td align="right" width="50%"> In Game Name: </td> <td align="left" width="50%"> <input id="username" name="username" autocomplete="off" maxlength="12"> </td>
So how would I make it add their IGN that they typed into that box come up onto their profile?

Read full topic
